## Modelos con logaritmos

```{r}
library(wooldridge)
library(tidyverse)
library(modelsummary)
```

### Lin-lin

```{r}
reg <- lm(wage ~ educ, data=wage1)
summary(reg)
```

### Log-lin

```{r}

reg <- lm(lwage ~ educ, data=wage1)
summary(reg)
```

### Lin-log

```{r}
wage2 <- wage1 |>
   filter(educ > 0) |>
  mutate(leduc=log(educ))


reg <- lm(wage ~ leduc, data=wage2)
summary(reg)

```

### Log-log

```{r}
reg <- lm(lwage ~ leduc, data=wage2)
summary(reg)
```
